title: Factoring: Difference of Squares
description: Factor expressions using the difference of squares pattern: $a^2 - b^2 = (a + b)(a - b)$

questions.question: Factor: $(x + y)^2 - (a + b)^2$
choices: $(x + y + a + b)(x + y - a - b)$
$(x + y + a + b)(x - y - a - b)$
questions.answer: $(x + y + a + b)(x + y - a - b)$

questions.question: Factor completely: $(a + b)^2 - (a - b)^2$
choices: $(a + b + a - b)(a + b - a + b)$

questions.question: Factor completely: $(x + y)^2 - (a - b)^2$
choices: $(x + y + a - b)(x + y - a + b)$
$(x + y + a - b)(x - y - a + b)$
questions.answer: $(x + y + a - b)(x + y - a + b)$
